external_references.description: Amitai Ben & Shushan Ehrlich. (2021, May). From Wiper to Ransomware: The Evolution of Agrius. Retrieved May 21, 2024.

objects.description: [DEADWOOD](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1134) changes the password for local and domain users via net.exe to a random 32 character string to prevent these accounts from logging on. Additionally, [DEADWOOD](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1134) will terminate the winlogon.exe process to prevent attempts to log on to the infected system.(Citation: SentinelOne Agrius 2021)
